properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O siligi lai Odede,
ninye Laitoriani
O siligi lai Odede
supa ninye Laitoriani.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Najoki nkanashe nanyor,
katumo siligi, O
siligi lai Odede
ninye Laitoriani.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Najoki lalashe lasham,
katumo siligi
O siligi lai Odede
ninye Laitoriani.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Najoki papa lai lasham,
katumo siligi
O siligi lai Odede
ninye Laitoriani.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Najoki akuya lasham,
katumo siligi
O siligi lai Odede
ninye Laitoriani.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Najoki yeyo lai lasham,
katumo siligi
O siligi lai Odede
ninye Laitoriani.
